title: Asian Growth Stocks With High Insider Ownership
description: As global markets experience fluctuations influenced by trade policies and economic data, Asia's stock markets have shown resilience, with notable gains in regions like China and Japan. In this environment, growth companies with high insider ownership can be particularly appealing as they often indicate strong management confidence and alignment with shareholder interests.
content:
As global markets experience fluctuations influenced by trade policies and economic data, Asia's stock markets have shown resilience, with notable gains in regions like China and Japan. In this environment, growth companies with high insider ownership can be particularly appealing as they often indicate strong management confidence and alignment with shareholder interests.

Click here to see the full list of 595 stocks from our Fast Growing Asian Companies With High Insider Ownership screener.

Underneath we present a selection of stocks filtered out by our screen.

Overview: Samyang Foods Co., Ltd., along with its subsidiaries, operates in the food industry both within South Korea and internationally, with a market capitalization of approximately ₩11.20 billion.

Operations: Samyang Foods Co., Ltd. generates revenue through its operations in the food sector, serving both domestic and international markets.

Samyang Foods is positioned as a growth company with high insider ownership, trading at 36.7% below its estimated fair value. Its earnings are projected to grow significantly, surpassing market expectations with an annual growth rate of 27.5%. Recent product launches in the U.S., including MEP and Tangle, highlight its innovative approach to capturing new markets. Despite no recent insider trading activity, the company's strong revenue forecast and high-quality earnings reinforce its growth potential in Asia's competitive landscape.
• Unlock comprehensive insights into our analysis of Samyang Foods stock in this growth report.
• Our comprehensive valuation report raises the possibility that Samyang Foods is priced higher than what may be justified by its financials.

Overview: APT Medical Inc. specializes in the research, development, manufacturing, and supply of electrophysiology and vascular interventional medical devices in China with a market cap of CN¥42.02 billion.

Operations: The company's revenue is primarily derived from its medical products segment, amounting to CN¥2.17 billion.
summary: The list of 595 stocks from our Fast Growing Asian Companies With High Insider Ownership screener includes Samyang Foods Co., Ltd. which operates in the food industry both within South Korea and internationally, with a market capitalization of approximately €11.20 billion. The company is positioned as a growth company with high insider ownership, trading at 36.7% below its estimated fair value and projected to grow significantly, surpassing market expectations with an annual growth rate of 27.5%. Despite no recent insider trading activity, the company's strong revenue forecast and high-quality earnings reinforce its growth potential in Asia's competitive landscape.
shortSummary: The high insider ownership of Samyang Foods highlights its strong growth potential amid global market volatility, with potential for significant earnings growth.

About the Company
| Founded | Employees | CEO | Website |
|---|---|---|---|
| 2002 | 2,555 | Zhenghui Cheng | www.aptmed.com |
APT Medical Inc. engages in the research, development, manufacturing, and supply of electrophysiology and vascular interventional medical devices in China. The company offers electrophysiological products comprising mapping catheters, ablation catheters, transseptal needle and sheaths, and steerable sheaths; and interventional cardiology and peripheral intervention products, such as introducer kits, guiding extension catheters, balloon catheters, guiding catheters, microcatheters, guidewires, hydrophilic angiographic catheters, hydrophilic guidewires, hemostatsis introducers, radial compression devices, aspiration catheters, inflation devices, Y connectors, snare kits, hemostasis valves, L guiding sheaths, balloon occlusion microcatheters, embolic protection device, transjugular liver access sets, and steerable guiding sheaths. It also provides OEM/ODM services, including project design and development, customization, and volume OEM, etc. APT Medical Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

About the Company
| Founded | Employees | CEO | Website |
|---|---|---|---|
| 1961 | 1,994 | In-Chang Chun | www.samyangfoods.com |
Samyang Foods Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the food business in South Korea and internationally. It is also involved in vegetable soup selection and packaging; cardboard processing; transportation and warehouse storage; grain manufacturing; other processed food wholesale; and dealership activities. In addition, the company manufactures and sells noodles, snacks, seasoning ingredients, ramen, confectionery, and dairy products.

argos_summary: Asia's stock markets, particularly in China and Japan, have shown resilience amid global fluctuations, with growth companies featuring high insider ownership being particularly attractive. Samyang Foods Co., Ltd., a South Korean food company, is highlighted for its significant growth potential, with projected earnings growth of 27.5% annually and trading at 36.7% below its estimated fair value. APT Medical Inc., specializing in medical devices in China, also demonstrates strong revenue growth and market performance.
